desc: At Clothes Mentor in South Windsor we buy and sell second hand designer clothing. Shop our online store to find a great selection of designer handbags, wallets, jewelry, shoes, clothes, and more. All of our products are inspected and tested by experts so you can expect a great experience. Shop today!

layout.text:
At Clothes Mentor we buy & sell
your gently used designer handbags,
clothing, shoes & accessories.
